uk.ac.uea.mathsthing

Interface IFormulaParser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IObservable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleParser

    public interface IFormulaParser
extends IObservable
    Provides methods to interact with the parser. Allows a tokenised formula to be provided to the parser, and lets the calling code retrieve various results from working on the tokens.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jordan Woerner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFormula getFirstDerivative()
      Gets the first derivative of the stored formula.
      java.math.BigDecimal getResult(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
      Gets the resulting number from using the stored formula with the provided parameter values replacing the parameter names in the tokens.
      IFormula getSecondDerivative()
      Gets the second derivative of the store formula.
      IFormula parse()
      Parses the formula provided.
      void setFormula(Token[] tokenised)
      Sets the formula that this parser should work on to a specified array of tokens.

      • Methods inherited from interface uk.ac.uea.mathsthing.util.IObservable

        attach, detach, update

    • Method Detail

      • setFormula

        void setFormula(Token[] tokenised)
        Sets the formula that this parser should work on to a specified array of tokens.
        Parameters:
        tokenised - A Token array of the required formula tokens.
        Since:
        1.0

      • parse

        IFormula parse()
        Parses the formula provided.
        Returns:
        Returns the newly created IFormula.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getResult

        java.math.BigDecimal getResult(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the resulting number from using the stored formula with the provided parameter values replacing the parameter names in the tokens.
        Parameters:
        params - A mapping of the parameter token names to their required values. A parameter can only be mapped in this set once.
        Returns:
        A floating point value from the result of the computation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if there is an error when evaluating the formula.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getFirstDerivative

        IFormula getFirstDerivative()
        Gets the first derivative of the stored formula.
        Returns:
        A IFormula representing the first derivative of the formula.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getSecondDerivative

        IFormula getSecondDerivative()
        Gets the second derivative of the store formula.
        Returns:
        A IFormula representing the second derivative of the formula.
        Since:
        1.0
